name: GeoTIFF, Revision 1.0

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">still-image</field><field name="filenameExtension">tif, tiff, gtiff</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: GeoTIFF refers to TIFF files which have geographic (or cartographic) data embedded as tags within the TIFF file. The geographic data can then be used to position the image in the correct location and geometry on the screen of a geographic information display.
